title: Loops (for / while)
concept: This level focuses on using for and while loops in Python. You will practice printing sequences, computing sums, factorial, digit operations and simple number algorithms.

challenges.title: Print 1 to N
challenges.description: Read an integer N and print numbers from 1 to N separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Sum of 1 to N
challenges.description: Calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to N and print it.

challenges.title: Factorial
challenges.description: Read N and print N! (factorial of N). Assume N is non-negative and small enough.
challenges.starterCode:
n = int(input())
# compute factorial using loop

challenges.title: Multiplication Table
challenges.description: Read an integer N and print its multiplication table from 1 to 10. Each line should be: N x i = value

challenges.title: Count Digits
challenges.description: Read an integer and print how many digits it has.

challenges.title: Sum of Digits
challenges.description: Read an integer n and print the sum of its digits.

challenges.title: Reverse Number
challenges.description: Read an integer and print its digits in reverse order (as integer).

challenges.title: Power a^b
challenges.description: Read integers a and b and compute a^b using a loop (do not use built-in pow).
challenges.starterCode:
a, b = map(int, input().split())
# compute a^b

challenges.title: Fibonacci N Terms
challenges.description: Print the first N Fibonacci numbers separated by spaces. Start with 0 1 1 2 3...
challenges.outputDescription: N Fibonacci numbers on one line.
challenges.starterCode:
n = int(input())
# print first n fibonacci numbers

challenges.title: Prime or Not
challenges.description: Check if a number is prime. Print Yes if prime, otherwise print No.
challenges.starterCode:
n = int(input())
# check primality using loop
